title: Wolfgang
description: Priscilla Kingston, a young girl with a talent, a dangerous talent if ever found by out by enemy hands... Xander Wolfgang, a man on a mission to find the girl who could decipher anything... Priscilla's talents were a curse, that's what her father told her anyway. It wasn't until Xander stole her away that she fully understood what her father had been protecting her from all of these years... Protecting her from the likes of Xander Wolfgang.  WARNING: THIS BOOK IS RECOMMENDED FOR READERS AGED 18 YEARS AND OVER. IT CONTAINS MATERIAL OF SEX AND SUBMISSION AND VIOLENCE.
author: E.L. Beth
